statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); style=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.output_style.name'); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo ''); time=$(date '+%H:%M:%S'); dir=$(basename "$cwd"); printf "\033[2m%s\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$model" "$dir"; [ -n "$branch" ] && printf " \033[33m%s\033[0m" "$branch"; printf " \033[90m%s\033[0m %s" "$time" "$style"
